title: Part 111 - Statement of Actuarial Opinion and Actuarial Opinion Summary for Property/Casualty Insurers
content:

State Regulations
§ 111.1 - Definitions
§ 111.2 - Statement of actuarial opinion and actuarial opinion summary
§ 111.3 - Exemptions from electronic filing and submission requirements

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
